column4: i'm still trying to install WASTE (http://waste.sf.net/), but i can't seem to do it
the package comes with the source code, but when i unzip it and try doing things like "make" it doesn't work
i guess what i'm asking is: how do i compile the source?
make
'make install' doesn't work :( i'm still new...
can you describe what you're trying to do?
give me a second to take a look.
which one are you trying to install?
wxwaste_1.5_beta_4
downloading it now...
thanks
./configure --prefix=/usr

yep
it says ./configure: No such file or directory
your directory is messed up...there is a configure file in the one I downloaded

yes
